twoSetSkill.name: Schrodinger's Cat 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When attacked, there is a 50% chance that said attack suffers 70% Total DMG Reduction. Otherwise, said attack gains 40% Total DMG Multiplier

threeSetSkill.name: Schrodinger's Equation 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: All stigmata buffs from this stigmata set gain a 10% trigger chance. Himeko equip bonus: Gain another 10% trigger chance.
